scripts.devtest: npm run build && cross-env HC_APP_PORT=$(port) HC_ADMIN_PORT=$(port) BUILD_MODE='dev' concurrently "npm run start:happ" "npm run start:ui"
scripts.start:happ: RUST_LOG=warn WASM_LOG=debug echo "pass" | ../$npm_package_config_bin/hc s --piped -f=$HC_ADMIN_PORT generate ../artifacts/file_share.happ --run=$HC_APP_PORT -a file_share-applet network mem
scripts.start:happ:local: RUST_LOG=warn WASM_LOG=debug echo "pass" | ../$npm_package_config_bin/hc s --piped -f=$HC_ADMIN_PORT generate ../artifacts/file_share.happ --run=$HC_APP_PORT -a file_share-applet network --bootstrap http://127.0.0.1:$BOOT_PORT webrtc ws://127.0.0.1:$SIGNAL_PORT
scripts.start:local: cross-env HC_APP_PORT=$(port) HC_ADMIN_PORT=$(port) BUILD_MODE='dev' concurrently "npm run start:happ:local" "npm run start:ui"
scripts.network:local2: npm run build && cross-env BOOT_PORT=$(port) SIGNAL_PORT=$(port) concurrently "npm run serve:run" "npm run start:local" "sleep 1 && npm run start:local"
